title: Room-Temperature-Modulated Polymorphism of Nonfullerene Acceptors Enable Efficient Bilayer Organic Solar Cells
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE02330G, Paper
Zhenmin Zhao, Sein Chung, Young Yong Kim, Minyoung Jeong, Xin Li, Jingjing Zhao, Chaofeng Zhu, Safakath Karuthedath, Yufei Zhong, Kilwon Cho, Zhipeng Kan
Polymorphism of nonfullerene acceptors enhances electron transport properties and potentially impacts the performance of organic electronic devices. However, their application in organic solar cells is limited by the required high-temperature...
